name: Mask Detection on Attendance System
description:
An application that provide attendance system that also make sure if the attending person using mask due to covid19. This system utilize
Local Binary Pattern Histogram (LBPH) for the face detection. To recognize the person identity, VGGNet16 was utilized. And for the mask
detection, Yolov5 was utilized. MySQL was used as the database to record the user attendance data. All the system was implemented in a
Raspberry Pi 4.
